gw.api.assignment

Class AssignmentSearchCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.assignment.AssignmentSearchCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AssignmentSearchCriteria
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Encapsulates the search criteria used to search for an assignee, such as a user, group or queue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      GroupSearchCriteria GroupCriteria
      The criteria used to search for a group, will be used if search type is "Group".
      com.guidewire.pl.system.service.search.AssignableQueueSearchCriteria QueueCriteria
      The criteria used to search for a queue, will be used if search type is "Queue".
      AssignmentSearchType SearchType
      Return the type of assignee being searched for; one of "User", "Group" or "Gueue".
      UserSearchCriteria UserCriteria
      The criteria used to search for a user, will be used if search type is "User".

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssignmentSearchCriteria()
      Create a new, empty search criteria object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AssignmentSearchResult performSearch()
      Performs the search based on the search type and the corresponding criteria object. For example, if search type is "Queue" uses the queue criteria to do the search.

      Please note that the search criteria validation on this method is not customizable through Gosu. For customization, a new method should be created through enhancement and called from the other places.
      void setGroupCriteria(GroupSearchCriteria groupCriteria)
      Set the criteria used to search for a group, will be used if search type is "Group".
      void setQueueCriteria(com.guidewire.pl.system.service.search.AssignableQueueSearchCriteria queueCriteria)
      Set the criteria used to search for a queue, will be used if search type is "Queue".
      void setSearchType(AssignmentSearchType searchType)
      Set the type of assignee being searched for; one of "User", "Group" or "Gueue".
      void setUserCriteria(UserSearchCriteria userCriteria)
      Set the criteria used to search for a user, will be used if search type is "User".
      boolean validate()
      Check that the criteria are valid by first checking that the search type is set and then checking the appropriate criteria object (for example if search type is "Group", checks that the group criteria are valid).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssignmentSearchCriteria

        AssignmentSearchCriteria()

    • Method Detail

      • performSearch

        AssignmentSearchResult performSearch()
        Performs the search based on the search type and the corresponding criteria object. For example, if search type is "Queue" uses the queue criteria to do the search.

        Please note that the search criteria validation on this method is not customizable through Gosu. For customization, a new method should be created through enhancement and called from the other places.

        Returns:
        an AssignmentSearchResult object encapsulating the results of the search.

      • setGroupCriteria

        void setGroupCriteria(GroupSearchCriteria groupCriteria)
        Set the criteria used to search for a group, will be used if search type is "Group".
        Parameters:
        groupCriteria -

      • setQueueCriteria

        void setQueueCriteria(com.guidewire.pl.system.service.search.AssignableQueueSearchCriteria queueCriteria)
        Set the criteria used to search for a queue, will be used if search type is "Queue".
        Parameters:
        queueCriteria -

      • setSearchType

        void setSearchType(AssignmentSearchType searchType)
        Set the type of assignee being searched for; one of "User", "Group" or "Gueue".
        Parameters:
        searchType -

      • setUserCriteria

        void setUserCriteria(UserSearchCriteria userCriteria)
        Set the criteria used to search for a user, will be used if search type is "User".
        Parameters:
        userCriteria -

      • validate

        boolean validate()
        Check that the criteria are valid by first checking that the search type is set and then checking the appropriate criteria object (for example if search type is "Group", checks that the group criteria are valid).
        Returns:
